utils.access.op

Interface Condition

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndCondition, CompareCondition, EqualsSingleValueCondition, FieldAccess

    public interface Condition
    Condition in a mongo query

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Condition optimize()
      returns an optimized version of the condition
      boolean satisfiedBy(java.lang.Object obj)
      returns true if the provided object satisfies this condition
